subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Johnson pulled away after the final restart with 13 laps to go and won the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Atlanta Motor Speedway in Hampton, Ga., on Sunday.
snippet: Johnson pulled away after the final restart with 13 laps to go and won the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Atlanta Motor Speedway in Hampton, Ga., on Sunday.
